fields.name: title
fields.label: Title
fields.description: Title of notice. Maximum of 64 characters.

fields.name: image
fields.label: Image
fields.description: Image to use in the notice.

fields.name: update
fields.label: Update
fields.description: Use one of the conventions i.e., 'Added 5 January', 'Updated 6 Janurary', 'Updated 4pm, 6 January'

fields.name: moreinformation
fields.label: More information
fields.description: URL for more information. If a URL is supplied, the text of the link will always be 'More information'. If this field is left blank, the owners name with the owners email will be used.

fields.name: owner
fields.label: Owner
fields.description: Owner or person responsible for this notice. This is not displayed unless 'More information' (above) is blank.

fields.name: owneremail
fields.label: Owner email address
fields.description: Valid email address for the owner or person responsible for this notice. This is not displayed unless 'More information' (above) is blank.

fields.name: autohide
fields.label: Auto hide
fields.description: When to automatically hide this notice.

fields.name: notes
fields.label: Notes
fields.description: Administrative notes for this notice. These notes are not displayed.
